name: places/ChIJh7cOXOP3wokR-eeD-mo38SI
formattedAddress: 290 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 290 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10025-5200, USA

originalText.text:
Betsy is a god send! She took my bare bones Brooklyn apartment and transformed it into something straight out of Elle Decor. On a budget! Her design process is professional yet personal - she takes the time to understand your functional needs and your personal style and she incorporates both into the final product. My post-Betsy apartment felt twice as big yet intimate and cozy.  She knows which items to splurge on and which items to buy at Ikea. My apartment felt luxurious without the ridiculous expense of a "high end" designer.
When I sold my apartment in Brooklyn (to move to LA) I didn't spend $$$ to have someone stage it - it was already perfect! I can't wait to buy a home in LA . . . . when I do, Betsy will be my first call.  I can't recommend her enough.

originalText.text:
I've worked with Betsy on two of my homes now.  My last home in California and now my new home in NJ, which was a new construction build.  I think I've used all her different services at this point - virtual multi room makeovers, hourly consults, the buying service and even finally an in-person consult when we moved back east.  I think the best testament of her work is how my CA house showed so well when it was on the market that the buyer asked if they could buy all my furniture!    Then in my new build where we had to make lots of decisions quickly, Betsy held my hand and helped me through that overwhelming process.
What I love about working with Betsy and her team is she knows my style, she elevates it and she doesn't ever make me feel self conscious about my budget.   I recommended Betsy and her team to my BFF as well and she too was so thrilled with how everthing turned out.   Whereas I'm into color, my girlfriend is into neutrals.   The Uploft team is terrific at working with all styles.

originalText.text: I have worked with Betsy for two years and she has helped me transform my house into a home. After our initial meeting, she immediately understood my design taste and goals and has beautifully overhauled my family room, TV room, outdoor spaces, and more. Her company is so easy to work with, making the whole process of buying furniture exciting instead of stressful. Thank you!

After our initial meeting, she immediately understood my design taste and goals and has beautifully overhauled my family room, TV room, outdoor spaces, and more. Her company is so easy to work with, making the whole process of buying furniture exciting instead of stressful. Thank you!

originalText.text: I worked with Betsy for one apartment and loved her work so much I hired her again when I moved. She did amazing work under both circumstances. The first time I was in a huge, un-renovated loft with a partner who already had a lot of stuff, and working with her was better than couple's counseling! She helped create a space that we both really loved. When we moved to a newer, more modern apartment she helped us start almost from scratch. She found wallpaper in the pattern of a pair of pants I casually mentioned I loved. She sourced the furniture from the stores that give discounts to folks who just moved. She knew which of the pieces would work in the new space. She insisted my desk face a different direction and it improved the feeling of my entire workspace. And I learned so much about interior design just by being her client! I have recommended her over and over, and will continue to do so!

originalText.text: Worked with Betsy to design and implement a new look for a condo. It came out great. They are very responsive and attentive to details. Betsy is a master designer, she has amazing artistic ideas and understood the look I was going for. Highly recommended!
